email_content:
Hi Sarah,

I hope you’re doing well.

I wanted to share a brief update on our student volunteer’s ongoing involvement with the Helping Hands Foundation:

• Engagement & Hours – Over the past several weeks the student has logged steady volunteer hours, frequently arriving early for events and often being the last to leave. Their total hours for this semester are up-to-date in our tracking sheet and continue to grow each week.

• Roles Undertaken – They have supported event set-up and tear-down, managed registration tables, packed donation kits, and even mentored newer volunteers.

• Feedback from Staff – Feedback has been overwhelmingly positive. Team members describe the student as punctual, eager to help, and an inspiring presence for others. Several people have referred to them as a true “valuable asset” to the foundation.

• Next Steps – The student is enthusiastic about taking on additional responsibility during the upcoming Community Outreach Fair next month. We’re working on scheduling details now and will confirm with you soon.

Please let me know if you need any additional information, documentation, or a detailed hour log; I’ll be happy to forward it.

Thank you again for the opportunity to collaborate and for all that you do at Helping Hands.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Contact Information]
